price: 37. Arrinkani waxaa ugu sugan waano kan qalbi leh ama maqalka raariciya isagoo baraarugsan.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلۡبٌ أَوۡ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika ladhik'rā liman kāna lahu qalbun aw alqā al-samʿa wahuwa shahīdun
